Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Islandia Drive, south of the Paladin's Shrine of Truth and Fairness. There are a number of shops to the south of the road.
Room.LongDescription: The Paladin's Shrine of Truth and Fairness is a testing ground to which the worthy paladin will test their skills and the shrine will determine their worthiness to advance in the ranks of the holy knights.
